author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-667: Added exclusion for the "owlapi" to the hermit dependency. This avoids importing the owlapi that is anyway includes in the "o.a.s.commons.owl" module.
Additionally I removed the "owlapi" from the parent pom as it is anyway only referenced by "o.a.s.commons.owl" and loaded from an embedded maven repository of this module.
